transcendence

Class Gamma

  • java.lang.Object
    • transcendence.Gamma

  • public class Gamma
extends Object
    Gamma function, factorial.

      Constructor and Description
      Gamma()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static BigInteger factorial(long n)
      Factorial for long type.
      static int factorial32(int n)
      Factorial function for small positive integer values.
      static BigDecimal gamma(BigDecimal D)
      Calculates an approximation to gamma(D), using Lanczos algorithm and the fact that
      gamma(D) = D * gamma(D-1).
      static BigDecimal incompleteGamma(BigDecimal a, BigDecimal x)
      Returns the incomplete gamma function, IG(a,x).
      static BigDecimal lanczosApproximation(BigDecimal D)
      Finds an approximation of Gamma(D) for BigDecimal D, (sometimes (D-1)!).
      static BigDecimal stirlingApproximation(BigDecimal D)
      Finds an approximation of Gamma(D+1) for BigDecimal D, i.e.

    • Method Detail

      • factorial

        public static BigInteger factorial(long n)
        Factorial for long type. Returns a BigInteger equal to n!. Only suitable for arguments well inside 32-bit int range, even though it accepts long values. For large values use an approximation instead.
        Parameters:
        n -
        Returns:

      • factorial32

        public static int factorial32(int n)
        Factorial function for small positive integer values.
        Parameters:
        n - non-negative integer, less than 17.
        Returns:
        factorial of n, n!

      • lanczosApproximation

        public static BigDecimal lanczosApproximation(BigDecimal D)
        Finds an approximation of Gamma(D) for BigDecimal D, (sometimes (D-1)!).
        Parameters:
        D -
        Returns:
        lanczos approximation of Gamma(D).

      • gamma

        public static BigDecimal gamma(BigDecimal D)
        Calculates an approximation to gamma(D), using Lanczos algorithm and the fact that
        gamma(D) = D * gamma(D-1).
        Parameters:
        D - BigDecimal d.
        Returns:
        Gamma(D)

      • incompleteGamma

        public static BigDecimal incompleteGamma(BigDecimal a,
                                         BigDecimal x)
        Returns the incomplete gamma function, IG(a,x). Algorithm taken from
        Numerical Recipes 6.2, p. 216
        Parameters:
        a -
        x -
        Returns:
        incomplete gamma function

      • stirlingApproximation

        public static BigDecimal stirlingApproximation(BigDecimal D)
        Finds an approximation of Gamma(D+1) for BigDecimal D, i.e. for integers D!.
        Parameters:
        D -
        Returns:
        stirling approximation of Gamma(D+1)
